metadata.synopsis: Mijah is calm, cool and collected. Despite her young age Mijah has seen more than her fair share of fights. She is an excellent example of a Harper Veteran. This dialogue covers all main states in Haven.

0.speaker: Harper Mijah
0.text: Glad you made it through the dark.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.NodeContext: Sincere - you know what could have happened out there

1.speaker: Harper Mijah
1.text: No surprise to find a traitor among the Flaming Fist. Honour isn't their strong suit.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: Grim but also you trust your own people to watch your back - you don't need the flaming fists

2.speaker: Harper Mijah
2.text: Take it easy while you can - we'll keep the watch.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: Calm and reassuring

3.speaker: Harper Mijah
3.text: You're lucky Jaheira gave you the all-clear, or I'd be looking at you next.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: said matter of factly - she trusts jaheira with her life
